#summary Shibboleth

This includes two steps: firstly, you need a working SP; secondly, configure Davis to interactive with SP.

== Shibboleth SP ==

Follow instruction from AAF to set up a standard SP:

http://wiki.aaf.edu.au/tech-info/sp-install-guide




uncomment
{{{
    <Attribute name="urn:oid:2.5.4.3" id="cn"/>
    <Attribute name="urn:oid:0.9.2342.19200300.100.1.3" id="mail"/>
    <Attribute name="urn:oid:2.5.4.7" id="l"/>
    <Attribute name="urn:oid:2.5.4.10" id="o"/>
}}}
add the following line to attribute-map.xml:
{{{
<Attribute name="urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.27856.1.2.5" id="auEduPersonSharedToken"/>
}}}
